page.title: 17Macclesfield- Relief Road.
page.content: Much argument has taken place over the proposed route of Macclesfield's Relief Road.One problem is where the northern end of the road will finish. There are two ideas as to where this junction will be. The first junction would be at the present junction of Flash Lane with Manchester Road(the main road). The second option would be for the road to finish near Dumbah Lane's junction with Manchester Road and Heybridge Lane. People living in Prestbury and Bollington will be especially affected by the outcome. Arguments are still continuing and no final decision has yet been made.Some people feel that the road will be too late coming.Others believe that the arguments stop the road ever being built.Time will tell!
